flawed_nl_solution:
There are 6500 kg - 150 kg = <<6500-150=6350>>6350 kg of sellable potatoes.
These will fit into 6350 kg / 50 kg/bag = <<6350/50=217>>217 bags
In total, these will be sold for 217 bags * $72/bag = $<<217*72=15624>>15624
#### 15624

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 127, not 217. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
